body:
I took a stab at this...it's been a while since I've contributed so let me know if I did anything wrong in the contribution process: https://go-review.googlesource.com/#/c/7923/1/sandbox/sandbox.go

I'm also not sure if this is the best way to check if the package != 'main', please critique or just throw it away.

Contributing to playground as a newcomer was kind of difficult, I would love to help improve the docs if someone could answer a couple of dumb questions for me:

1. How do I tail the log? I'm using `boot2docker` and `docker` as the README mentions, but I couldn't find the output anywhere so I was sending stuff to myself in API responses.
2. How do I see the web stuff locally? Do I have to use the python development server for GAE?
